snippet.title: Ruby's REBALANCED Halo Reach Campaign!
snippet.description:
A full Campaign mod all about rebalancing the game to help it reach its full potential through being more fun, fair, but still challenging. Featuring tweaks to the sandbox such that every weapon, vehicle and armor ability is viable and useful, changes to AI to make them more fun and interesting, and additions to scenarios and encounters that makes levels more exciting and large-scale.

PATREON ►: https://www.patreon.com/RubyofBlue
TWITCH  ►: https://www.twitch.tv/ruby_of_blue
TWITTER ►: https://twitter.com/RubyofBlue
DISCORD ►: https://discord.gg/NYg5cGy

DOWNLOAD:
https://www.nexusmods.com/halothemasterchiefcollection/mods/191/

SPECIAL THANKS TO PATRONS:
Kenyaun
SuddenlyOrangesandFriends
AlephinNetkey
David Dinger
Vinvan Artsy
Fungo
Omni Discussions
Doublajynxx
XtremetuberVII

#halo #haloreachmods #halorebalanced
